snippet: In what officials said was the first time such a reward had been offered, the State Department said it was targeting a syndicate based in Laos.
abstract: United States announces $1 million reward for information to help dismantle one of Asia’s largest wildlife-trafficking syndicates.
lead_paragraph: In what officials said was the first time such a reward had been offered, the State Department said it was targeting a syndicate based in Laos.

headline.main: U.S. Offers Reward in Wildlife-Trade Fight
headline.print_headline: U.S. Offers Reward in Wildlife-Trade Fight
